channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Integrated Dell Remote Access Controller 9
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Integrated Dell Remote Access Controller 9

item.title: CVE-2022-34435|2024-08-03T09:07:16.249Z -- dell -- integrated%20dell%20remote%20access%20controller%209
item.description: Dell iDRAC9 version 6.00.02.00 and prior contain an improper input validation vulnerability in Racadm when the firmware lock-down configuration is set. A remote high privileged attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass the firmware lock-down configuration and perform a firmware update.

item.title: CVE-2022-24422|2024-08-03T04:13:55.639Z -- dell -- integrated%20dell%20remote%20access%20controller%209
item.description: Dell iDRAC9 versions 5.00.00.00 and later but prior to 5.10.10.00, contain an improper authentication vulnerability. A remote unauthenticated attacker may potentially exploit this vulnerability to gain access to the VNC Console.

item.title: CVE-2024-25943|2024-06-29T12:52:27.699Z -- dell -- integrated%20dell%20remote%20access%20controller%209
item.description: iDRAC9, versions prior to 7.00.00.172 for 14th Generation and 7.10.50.00 for 15th and 16th Generations, contains a session hijacking vulnerability in IPMI. A remote attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to arbitrary code execution on the vulnerable application.

item.title: CVE-2024-25943|2024-07-02T19:19:06.056Z -- dell -- integrated%20dell%20remote%20access%20controller%209
item.description: iDRAC9, versions prior to 7.00.00.172 for 14th Generation and 7.10.50.00 for 15th and 16th Generations, contains a session hijacking vulnerability in IPMI. A remote attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to arbitrary code execution on the vulnerable application.
